name: Delay Major Minor
description: Volume swell effect that also has optional minor and major third intervals that can be optionally mixed in when the left or right foot swtich is held down.  The minor and major thirds are fed through their  own delays.  Overall, this creates an interesting ambient effect.  It takes a little practice using the minor and major third buttons but once you get the hang of it, cool things can happen.
left-pot-function: Basically how long the echo lasts before dying out
right-pot-function: How far apart the echos are (0.1 to 3 seconds)
left-switch-function: When pressed, mixes in audio to minor third pitch shift that goes through a delay
right-switch-function: When pressed, mixes in audio to major third pitch shift that goes through a delay
creator: DreamMaker
